mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TACTICS_BOARD(BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES(TACTICS_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, WRITER, REGDATE FROM TACTICS_BOARD ORDER BY BNO DESC
SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE FROM TACTICS_BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno}

SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT FROM (SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BNO DESC) AS RNUM FROM TACTICS_BOARD WHERE 1=1 ) TACTICS WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY BNO DESC

SELECT COUNT(BNO) FROM TACTICS_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND BNO > 0
